title: EcoFlow Debuts its Whole-home Backup Power Solution and Three New Smart Devices at CES 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow, a portable power and eco-friendly energy solutions company, launched a new Whole-home Backup Power Solution that replaces noisy generators with a quiet, reliable portable home battery setup. The company also announced three new outdoor smart devices: a robotic lawn-sweeping mower that collects leaves, a portable fridge with a built-in ice maker, and a portable air conditioner that offers both heating and cooling.
